update cur_workshop_price a,
(
	SELECT '2012' as year,'9' as month,
		'f981f9cc-0283-4bd2-8d9e-5eb1d49144cb' as workshop_id,
		entry_material_id as material_id,
		0 as beginvolume,
		0 as beginsum,
		100000*RAND() as volume,
		100000*RAND() as totalsum
	FROM material_bom_entry 
	where parent_id = '8c695545-e5a5-442e-8245-bc148404559f'
) b set a.volume = a.volume + b.volume,a.totalsum = a.totalsum + b.totalsum
where a.workshop_id = b.workshop_id and a.material_id = b.material_id;

物料ID：6f49ba55-6eb9-4897-96ee-016e8b7bbee1
实际物料ID：a77985d1-f5ba-4e16-97a0-79815101c150
BOM单ID：523df158-6052-41ab-ad34-e706097c28eb
实际BOM单ID：8c695545-e5a5-442e-8245-bc148404559f
车间ID：f981f9cc-0283-4bd2-8d9e-5eb1d49144cb
